Title: Pokémon the Movie: Destiny Deoxys
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: James Carter Cathcart (english version), Norman J. Grossfeld (english version), Kathy Pilon (english version), Hideki Sonoda
Actors: Veronica Taylor, Eric Stuart, Amy Birnbaum, Madeleine Blaustein
Plot: A comet bearing a deadly Pokemon creature crash-lands onto Earth, terrorising a nearby high-tech city, where Ash, Pikachu and friends are currently visiting...
